definition: to drill/to bore/to get into/to make one's way into/to enter (a hole)/to thread one's way through/to study intensively/to dig into/to curry favor for personal gain

sentences.english: The first skid-mounted drilling rigs exported to Hungary were manufactured by RG PETRO-MACHINERY(GROUP)CO. , LTD.
sentences.chinese: 第一臺出口歐盟的鑽機由南陽二機石油裝備集團製造。

sentences.english: The hydraulic system is the key part of the hydraulic drilling rig and has a great importance to the performances of the drilling rig.
sentences.chinese: 液壓系統是全液壓鑽機的核心，對整機性能影響很大。

sentences.english: A new rig is finding myselfsteveryed in this well site.
sentences.chinese: 一套新鑽機正在這個井場裝配。

sentences.english: If the design changes are necessary, they will be implemented from the third rig.
sentences.chinese: 如果設計變更有必要，將從第三臺鑽機開始執行。

sentences.english: And landowners keep wallowing in royalties whether the driller makes a profit or not.
sentences.chinese: 不管鑽機是否盈利，地主們只沉迷於收取土地使用費。

sentences.english: The application of down-the-hole drill in tunnel;
sentences.chinese: 潛孔鑽機以其特有的鑿孔特點佔據了很大一塊市場。

sentences.english: It is used to lift sections of pipe, which are lowered into the hole made by the drill.
sentences.chinese: 鑽機最明顯的部分是機架，因此提舉一節一節的鋼管。

sentences.english: Pneumatic motor is a kernel part of the roof bolter.
sentences.chinese: 錨杆鑽機氣動馬達是該設備的核心部件。

sentences.english: Machine fit double cylinder and powerful mud pump.
sentences.chinese: 本鑽機配帶雙缸大功率泥漿泵。

sentences.english: But in actual applications, spiral bevel gears on rigs are often damaged.
sentences.chinese: 但在實際應用中，鑽機中弧齒圓錐齒輪常損壞。

sentences.english: The ice pack and icebergs pose various threats to drilling rigs and crews.
sentences.chinese: 浮冰和冰山對鑽機和人員構成多種威脅。

sentences.english: The shortest are about 65 feet, or 20 metres, high.
sentences.chinese: 最矮小的鑽機則只有65尺或20米高。

sentences.english: Drill your holes using a drill bit that is the same diameter as your screws.
sentences.chinese: 用鑽機鑽出和你的螺絲一樣口徑的洞。

sentences.english: Dursley arrived in the Grunnings parking lot, his mind back on drills.
sentences.chinese: 他的注意力又回到鑽機上來了。

sentences.english: A hoisting drum is used in the drawworks of a drilling or workover rig.
sentences.chinese: 在鑽機或修井作業機的絞車中使用提升滾筒。

sentences.english: Is a leading manufacturer and supplier of drilling rig related equipment and supplies.
sentences.chinese: 是一家領先的製造商和供應商鑽機相關設備和用品。
